concept.title: Caller ID Routing
concept.shortdesc: Caller ID Routing allows you to route or reject inbound calls based on the caller's phone number.

conbody.p: If a call comes in from [Given Number] then send the call to [Given Destination]‚Äù which will in effect, send all calls that follow the rule to the right department, individual, queue or voicemail and enable you to utilise your staff more effectively.

This is a beneficial feature for companies whose sales/service teams cover specified regions. Calls are routed by the originating area code to a specific person or office location. Numbers that fall outside the standard area codes (such as 800 numbers or blocked numbers) could be sent directly to a designated account manager.
